channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Texas Democrats' plot to stall redistricting until Epstein files released fails
item.description: Texas House Democrats on Wednesday plan to offer an amendment that would block a Republican redistricting effort until the complete release of the Jef...

item.title: Trump team makes mortgage fraud its newest revenge tool
item.description: Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook is the latest target of one of the Trump administration's new pathways to pursue its perceived enemies: alleged mor...

item.title: Trump's war on the Fed is escalating
item.description: The Trump administration is pursuing wholesale change at the Federal Reserve with a ruthlessness and creativity that few Fed watchers could have imagi...

item.title: Trump housing regulator accuses Fed governor Cook of mortgage fraud
item.description: Federal housing finance regulator Bill Pulte accused Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook of mortgage fraud and referred her for criminal prosecution. W...

item.title: Epstein grand jury transcripts won't be unsealed, federal court rules
item.description: A federal judge denied the Trump administration's request to unseal Jeffrey Epstein grand jury transcripts and exhibits from a case in New York state....

item.title: These states could redistrict before the 2026 midterms
item.description: As Trump pushes for a more Republican-friendly House map, more than half a dozen states are potential targets for mid-decade tweaks to congressional b...

item.title: Vance says D.C. police takeover an example for other cities
item.description: White House Deputy Chief of Staff Stephen Miller also claimed that bringing in federal law enforcement is meant to protect Washington’s Black resident...

item.title: Trump calls for resignation of Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook
item.description: The president’s call appears to be his latest effort to influence the central bank board as he demands lower interest rates.

item.title: Obama supports California redistricting, says GOP can’t ‘rig the game’
item.description: The former president said that what Texas Republicans are doing requires an equally aggressive response from Democrats.

item.title: Texas state House on cusp of passing election map favored by Trump
item.description: The Republican-controlled chamber will gavel back into session Wednesday with an intent to vote on a plan to help the GOP in the midterms.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
